definition: Lintong District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: The on-site museum is located five kilometres east of Xi'an,in Lintong County.
sentences.chinese: 這座遺址性博物館位於先臨潼區以東5千米處。

sentences.english: Qinshihuang's Mausoleum is located in Lintong District, 35 kilometers east of Xi'an, capital of Shanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇陵位於陝西省西安市以東35公里的臨潼區。
